Subject: Provide indent contexts that may override indent information to indent helpers
Message:

about already-reindented lines through an `IndentContext` object, making it
possible to reindent a region in one go without re-parsing.

Author: Marijn Haverbeke
Subject: Add missing release notes
Message:
FEATURE: The [`tooltip`](##tooltip) package provides a way to show
tooltip over the editor.

FEATURE: The new [`autocomplete`](##autocomplete) package implements
an autocompletion interface.

FEATURE: The new [`lint`](##lint) package integrates linting with the
editor by underlining issues and providing a list of problems that you
can scroll through.

FEATURE: The `lang-javascript` package now exports an
[`esLint`](##lang-javascript.esLint) function that can be used to wire
up [ESLint](https://eslint.org/) to the CodeMirror lint integration.

BREAKING: Unique extensions no longer exist. Instead, extensions are
deduplicated by identity. Merging configurations for an extension
should now be done in a behavior.

FIX: Fix rendering of lines that are empty except for a widget.
